channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Help wanted: Companies that can write job ads that don’t discriminate against workers over 50
item.description: Help-wanted ads with buzzwords like “energetic,” “fast-paced,” “digital native” and “fresh perspectives” abound. But these potentially ageist descript...

item.title: Cracker Barrel backtracked on a remodel and logo change. Did that help the company?
item.description: Cracker Barrel faced a social-media backlash. It now faces “unique and ongoing headwinds” in its business.

item.title: Hassett’s prospects dip, but he’s still the front-runner for Fed chair, with Trump’s decision likely to come next month
item.description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday evening said his process for picking a successor to Fed Chair Jerome Powell, whose term ends in May, isn’t over.

item.title: Industrials stocks have been red-hot this year — mostly. One analyst explains which stocks to buy and which to avoid.
item.description: Nigel Coe of Wolfe Research says industrials have been a hot sector this year, but it’s a stock pickers market.

item.title: Amazon’s stock is this analyst’s ‘best idea’ for these 3 reasons
item.description: Amazon’s cloud, advertising and e-commerce businesses will drive revenue and margin growth in 2026, according to TD Cowen

item.title: Raymond James double upgrades alternative asset manager, says negative headlines are ‘overstated'
item.description: Analyst Wilma Burdis double upgraded the alternative investment manager to a strong buy from a market perform.

item.title: This satellite communications stock has quadrupled in 2025. Morgan Stanley sees more gains ahead
item.description: The bank upgraded shares of the telecommunications company to overweight from equal-weight.

item.title: This stock is moving away from IT and into AI and is breaking out. How to capture gains with options
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down this options trade on a transitioning IT stock.

item.title: Buy PepsiCo heading into 2026 as innovation drives earnings, says JPMorgan
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares of PepsiCo rising 13% from here.

item.title: JSPR Explodes on Briquilimab Asthma Breakthrough
item.description: JSPR stock surges on positive briquilimab asthma trial data. Explore risks, rewards, and biotech trading lessons as shares gain big early today.
